programme.title: HMS Titanic: Design Failure, U-Boat, or Iceberg?
programme.desc: The RMS Titanic sank April 14, 1912 on her maiden voyage after striking an iceberg in the North Atlantic killing over 1,500 people. Or did a design flaw doom the ship before it sailed? Rumors of a German U-Boat attack still persist. What is the truth?

programme.title: Crop Circles: Celestial Signs or Human Hoaxes?
programme.desc: Clearly some crop circles are hoaxes. Others are inexplicable, with no evidence of human activity. This program asks why do crops undergo changes at the cellular level and what are the strange lights seen over the fields where crop circles are found?

programme.title: Haunted House: Demon Poltergeist
programme.desc: For those who think that Ghosts and Spirits aren't real, this is a Ghost Investigation that will change their minds forever. The team from Haunted Events UK are called in to a 400 year old, three story, Victorian house on old High Street in Sutton Town, England - allegedly the most haunted area of Britain. Abandoned by the previous occupier due to alarming Poltergeist activity, the team enters the house to find it a wreck, strewn with objects scattered by the entities dwelling within its walls. Quickly, the team's medium is in touch with the Poltergeist who makes its presence known as a chair slides across the floor before their eyes, not once, but several times and on command. Unnerved but determined, the team moves around the house only to be bombarded by flying objects, lifting tables and two members of the team are even pushed to the floor. A never before filmed series of events occur, making this one of the most terrifying ghost hunts you will ever see. Witness flying objects, noises, thermal heat sources and experience strange forces working to warn the team to leave the residence by pushing over an investigator and leaving behind an actual thermal apparition.

programme.title: Secret Societies and Sacred Stones: from Mecca to Megaliths
programme.desc: For millennia mankind has worshipped stones, from Mecca to Megaliths we have held them aloft as sacred objects and gifts from the gods. The worship of sacred stones constitutes the most ancient form of religion. From the origin of ritualized worship in Sumeria and Egypt to Secret Societies such as the Knights Templar and the Illuminati, ancient stones have been been idolized and used in secret and magical ceremonies unknown to the outside world. They have been placed at the very center of religious icons, used to take power over the souls of others and have been fashioned into beautiful gems and artifacts and yet, the stones remain a mystery. But why? What is the secret in the stones? In this unique film we uncover the secrets of the stones with a group of experts including Egyptologist, Ahmed Osman, Metallurgist, Robert Feather, UFO expert, Nick Pope, TV presenter on the esoteric, Franky Ma, filmmaker, Zachary Miller and New York Times best selling author of mysteries, Patrice Chaplin. This special team were brought together for the motion picture, The Stone, and this fascinating documentary reveals the story behind the film and it's meaning. Produced by mystery writer, Andrew Gough and Directed by Writer & Director of The Stone, Philip Gardiner, this special DVD features unseen footage from the movie, music and loads of special features. Prepare to enter a magical realm of secrets and mystery.

programme.title: Mountain Meadows Nature Film - New 3 Hour Version!
programme.desc: “Mountain Meadows” features wildflower blooms from California’s Table Mountain ecological preserve, along with meadows & lakes in the High Sierra mountains. Stunning drone footage shows the beauty of summer meadows in bloom from an aerial perspective. A relaxing instrumental soundtrack accompanies these uplifting visuals to bring you a wonderful immersion into natures beauty. Available to subscribers of NatureStream.tv. Runtime 2 hours 53 minutes.

programme.title: Arches & Canyonlands Ambient Nature Film
programme.desc: The sublime landscape of Arches and Canyonlands area of Utah is the star in this 90 minute film, which showcases awe-inspiring natural arches, dramatic canyon vista sunrises & sunsets, and flights through arches and over the Colorado River canyon. The spectacular cinematography is accompanied by beautiful Native American flute music. Note: All Drone footage was filmed outside of National and State Park boundaries.

programme.title: Preview of Autumn Inspiration
programme.desc: This is a preview of Autumn Inspiration, available to stream at www.NatureStream.tv. Witness the beauty of the autumn seasons around the United States in this 35 minute program. This video showcases the diversity of our countrys spectacular landscapes. Experience changing colors, from the Sierra Nevada Mountains to the Rockies to the Eastern USA. The photography and cinematography of Olof and Elizabeth Carmel is paired with relaxing music to provide an exquisite "ambient art" experience for TV and mobile devices.

programme.title: Preview for "Journey Along the Oregon Coast"
programme.desc: Experience spectacular coastal landscapes in "Journey Along the Oregon Coast". See dramatic sea stacks illuminated by colorful skies, pristine beaches, spring wildflowers, and even watch a Roosevelt elk gallop along Canon Beach! This relaxing and exhilarating film is accompanied by the soothing sounds of ocean waves and birdsongs. The full film is 85 minutes in length and available to subscribers of www.NatureStream.tv.

programme.title: Preview for Rainforest Relaxation
programme.desc: Relax in the soothing greens of the rainforest in our newest release "Rainforest Relaxation". Clear creeks flow amongst the ancient ferns, and moss covered trees create intriguing forms and texture in this 45 minute nature film featuring the beauty of the Hoh rainforest in Olympic National Park. Available to subscribers of NatureStream.tv on November 13, 2021.

programme.title: Preview of "Hawaii, A Journey Through The Big Island"
programme.desc: Experience Big Island bliss in the stunning 2 hour film, available for streaming on May 16. Soar above waterfalls that plunge into the Pacific, kick back with views of beach sunsets and slow motion waves, enjoy island palms in the gentle island breezes, and experience the Waipio valley paradise from above. Dazzling cinematography is accompanied by a relaxing soundtrack. Available at www.NatureStream.tv. Run time 2 hours.

programme.title: Preview of A Journey Through Europe
programme.desc: This is a preview of “A Journey through Europe” available to stream at www.NatureStream.tv. This moving art display features the stunning photography and cinematography of Olof & Elizabeth Carmel. This 60 minute video is a relaxing and inspiring visual voyage through some of the most scenic regions of Europe. Countries featured include France, Italy, Sweden, England, Spain, and Greece. This video includes a beautiful instrumental soundtrack. Run time is 60 minutes.

programme.title: Yosemite Waterfalls & Wildflowers
programme.desc: In the Spring Yosemites spectacular waterfalls combine with an exquisite display of Dogwood blossoms to create an awe inspiring experience like no other. Immerse yourself in the wonders of Yosemite in this 2 hour relaxing nature film "Yosemite, Waterfalls & Wildflowers". The spectacular cinematography is accompanied by a beautiful acoustic guitar soundtrack.

programme.title: Ballroom Boxing

programme.title: Ballroom Boxing
programme.desc: Jimmy Lange vs James Johnson and more

programme.title: Pro Boxing Archive Series
programme.desc: Tom Johnson vs Orlando Soto from February 12, 1994

programme.title: Britney Spears vs. Justin Timberlake
programme.desc: S1:E8 Did Britney Spears really cheat on Justin Timberlake? Britney and Justin were the perfect couple until she was accused of cheating on him after their breakup. Justin told the world his side of the story and the media believed him while Britney was mocked and silenced. The whole world watched as Britney went from being the media’s pop princess to spiralling in a very public meltdown, but what did Justin have to do with it? Our team uncovered the truth behind what really happened, and what Justin’s iconic Cry Me a River video has to do with Britney’s freedom.

programme.title: Amber Rose vs. Kanye West
programme.desc: S1:E5 it true that Kanye West was harassing Amber Rose when she suddenly left him? When Kanye West started dating Amber Rose, he took her from the life of being a stripper to the global superstar world. At first, they seemed like a couple that was truly in love. But when Amber suddenly left Kanye, his attitude towards her completely changed. Our team uncovered the real story behind the tabloids of the years of bullying, unwanted media attention, and attacks that Amber had to suffer. The true story will reveal why she was the special woman Kanye fell in love with in the first place, and what she and Kim Kardashian have in common.

programme.title: Rihanna vs. Chris Brown
programme.desc: S1:E1 Rihanna found herself the victim of assault, from her best friend and then-boyfriend, Chris Brown. Not only was she humiliated in front of the world, but she also faced further attacks from the media, some going as far as claiming the violence was her fault. We uncovered the real story of Rihanna’s experience during and after the incident, not the one portrayed by the media, where she shows us why she is the strong, compassionate, graceful woman the world fell in love within the first place.

programme.title: The Rise of Charity Witt
programme.desc: S1:E5 Dubbed The Worlds Strongest Barbie, Charity suffered a heart attack when she was only 17 years old, due to being overworked and poor life choices. This health crisis lead her to change her mindset by taking action on changing her life, that put her on a path that lead her to becoming an elite powerlifter, a Strongwoman competitor, a winner of the Titan Games and escaping an abusive relationship.

programme.title: The Rise of Frank Shamrock
programme.desc: S1:E2 Frank Shamrock was one of the toughest fighters to ever compete in the UFC. He holds the world record for the fastest consecutive knockouts, but his biggest fight happened when he was a child, living with his stepfather. His stepfather emotionally abused him so devastatingly, that even when Frank was sent to a Juvenile Detention Center, the other kids couldn’t believe what he went through. While many kids would be crushed under such pain and suffering, Frank Shamrock was determined to prove why warriors always find a way to win.

programme.title: The Rise of Wim Hof
programme.desc: S1:E1 The Iceman (Wim Hof), a man seemingly immune to freezing temperatures, who once climbed Mount Everest only in his shorts and shoes sounds like a fictional superhero. But Wim isn’t invincible to pain, in fact, the opposite. The worst tragedy he’s suffered was the catalyst that inspired him to master his mind and body and help millions do the same.

programme.title: The Rise Of Damien Rider
programme.desc: S1:E7 Damien Rider was beaten up, thrown against walls, and left all by himself as a child because of an abusive stepfather. After four attempts to end his own life, he decided he needed to deal with his demons by doing the most extreme thing he could do. Discover why Damien felt like he needed to paddle through a deadly ocean and why when he was just about to quit, the entire trajectory of his life would be permanently changed forever.

programme.title: The Kardashian Redemption - The Unauthorized Documentary
programme.desc: When OJ Simpson destroyed her family, Kim Kardashian avenged her father, Robert Kardashian.

programme.title: GSP: Behind The Mask
programme.desc: As a child, Georges St-Pierre was bullied relentlessly by an older and much bigger boy at his school. He was tortured, and humiliated on a daily basis, leading to years of built up anger and frustration. It was this traumatizing childhood experience that led him to study martial arts and become one of the most celebrated UFC Champions in the world. Years later, Georges faced his childhood bully once again. What he chose to do in that moment is nothing short of amazing.

programme.title: Scott Smiley: Fighting for Life - A Soldier's Comeback
programme.desc: US Army Officer Scott Smiley was on a mission to protect his country when he accidentally became the victim of a shocking suicide bombing. What he does next is nothing short of a miracle.

programme.title: Kevin Berthia: The Golden Gate Bridge Guardian Angel
programme.desc: Kevin Berthia tells the true story of how the power of listening and hope saved him from the darkest moment of his life on the Golden Gate Bridge.

programme.title: Elon Musk: Revenge of the Geeks
programme.desc: Visionary entrepreneur, Elon Musk achieved the impossible with SpaceX and Tesla, but Elon’s success made people question his “real intentions”. A look inside his childhood reveals why Elon lived in fear as a child, and why he never talks about his father...

programme.title: Elizabeth Smart : Trapped and Lost
programme.desc: Elizabeth Smart was carried off at 14 years old and was missing for 9 grueling months. Those were the worst months of her life, the details of which were so terrible, she refused to share her story for ten years… until something changed. This is her story of survival and strength.

programme.title: The Dark Side of Elon Musk
programme.desc: Elon Musk, founder of SpaceX and CEO of Tesla, always found it hard fitting in with others. Hiding his painful secrets - Elon threw himself into his work, amassing huge success as an entrepreneur. But when he got caught up in the middle of a messy divorce with Amber Heard, Elon’s worst fears were realized and he hit a severe breaking point.

programme.title: Christine Ha: Courage in the Kitchen
programme.desc: In this exclusive Goalcast Original, the first blind contestant and winner of MasterChef, Christine Ha, opens up about how she lost her sight and her mother at a young age. These formative experiences shaped who she is today and pushed her to never give up on her dreams and finding ways to connect with the spirit of her mother.

programme.title: Terry Crews: My Biggest Regret
programme.desc: For years Terry Crews was terrified of his alcoholic father. Decades later, Terry finally confronts him about his childhood. But why does it become his biggest regret?

programme.title: Rock Thomas - Rock Bottom
programme.desc: Rock Thomas delivers a powerful, personal story on how to resist the labels forced on you in order to redefine yourself

programme.title: From Thief to Self-Made Millionaire
programme.desc: Watch John Assarafs personal story of growth, the lessons he learned early on in life, and how he went from robber to self-made millionaire by brushing his teeth.

programme.title: Wolf of Wallstreet's Darkest Hour

programme.title: Five Major Changes to Social Security for 2025: What You Need to Know

programme.title: EVs & High-End Cars: Debunking the Myths
How Much Do You Need to Retire in 2024?
programme.desc: There are some eye-opening insights into the magic number for your dream retirement in 2024. Whether youre already in the planning stages or just dipping your toes into the world of financial independence, understanding the dynamics between your expenses and portfolio is key. In this video, I delve into two real-life client scenarios to illustrate how seemingly small differences can have a profound impact on your retirement journey. For simplicity, lets call the first couple Bill and Susan and the second couple Tim and Sally. Their stories highlight the pivotal role that Social Security and other income sources play in determining the sustainability of your retirement portfolio.

programme.title: The New Retirement Strategy That's Changing the Game
programme.desc: In the world of financial planning, theres one thing that often gets overlooked. Retirement is not just about investments and numbers; its about embracing lifes joys and purposes.

programme.title: The Hidden Danger When Choosing A Supplemental Plan
programme.desc: In todays episode Marvin from Medicare School breaks down the critical choices between Advantage Plans and Supplemental Plans, making it clear why sometimes paying a bit more each month for a Supplemental Plan can be your ticket to stress-free healthcare coverage. Its also the Medigap Open Enrollment Period, a window of opportunity that shouldnt be missed, especially for those starting out on Medicare. Marvin is also going to walk you through the steps of choosing the right insurance carrier. He explains why going for a carrier with a market presence isnt just about the numbers; its about ensuring stability and avoiding the pitfalls of rate increases and limited coverage options. Tune in so that you move forward having a peace of mind with having the knowledge YOU need to choose the plan!

programme.title: Medicare Plan N Vs Plan G? Which Should YOU Choose?
programme.desc: Curious about your Medicare options? In todays video by Marvin Musick from Medicare School, youll uncover the key differences between Medicare Plan G and Plan N. Discover the benefits of both plans that allow you to choose from a wide range of healthcare providers, eliminating the hassle of pre-authorizations and providing lifelong coverage security. Plus, both plans come with a unique foreign travel emergency benefit, giving you peace of mind even when youre abroad! Marvin dives deep into the details of the coverage nuances. Plan G steps up with comprehensive coverage, addressing five out of six Medicare gaps, including deductibles, hospital co-pays after 60 days, skilled nursing facility co-pays, and more. It even covers excess charges added by specific doctors. On the other hand, Plan N offers four out of six Medicare gaps coverage, and while it comes with some small co-pays for doctor and emergency room visits, its slightly lower premium might catch your attention.

programme.title: EVs & High-End Cars: Debunking the Myths
Mini's Bold Move – The New Countryman Redefines Compact
programme.desc: "Join us as we dive into the specifications of the Countryman, which measures an impressive 174 inches in length and 63.5 inches in height, marking a significant departure from its compact roots. We discuss the innovative design elements that set the Countryman apart, including its striking aesthetics, advanced electrification options, and the powerful performance of its gas and electric models."

programme.title: Saschiz Old Town, Romania
programme.desc: Saschiz, village, and commune, Mureș județ county is located in central Romania. The villages of Saschiz, Mihai Viteazu, and Cloașterf make up the larger commune of Saschiz. Located in the old region of Transylvania, it lies about 20 km east of Sighișoara"&". First documented in the 14th century, Saschiz is known for its medieval fortress and church constructed by Transylvanian Saxons, a German speaker. They settled in Transylvania when it was part of Hungary. The ruins of the 14th-century fortress sit atop "&"a hill overlooking the village. The late 15th-century fortified church has Gothic details and an imposing clock tower. Along with five other villages with fortified churches, Saschiz was inscribed on UNESCO’s World Heritage sites in 1999.

programme.title: Born to Be Human
programme.desc: YANG Shi-Nan (Lily LEE) is a 14-year-old boy who undergoes a metamorphosis without realising what is going on. It begins on a normal school day when he gets stomach cramps. After rushing to the toilet he notices that his urine is turning bloody red. Taken to a doctor he is diagnosed with "Disorders of Sex Development," or intersex. Without consulting him, Shi-Nan's parents decide to accept "sex reassignment surgery", turning Shi-Nan into a female and changing her name to Shi-Lan. The family moves to a new city to start a new life and it all seems to be going well as Shi-Lan blends in and even makes friends. It seems like the butterfly is about to break out of its chrysalis but can Shi-Lan truly embrace her transformation?

programme.title: Trees
programme.desc: Bring the outside inside with a little creativity. Jenny Barnett-Rohrs makes a colorful leafy tree banner. Candie Cooper creates a fish kite and Katie Hacker builds a whimsical woods scene. Then, Jenny decorates a glittery tree to celebrate the holidays.

programme.title: Camp
programme.desc: Head to the great outdoors with camping crafts. Jenny Barnett-Rohrs fashions a talking stick like those used by ancient tribes. Then, she paints images of nature with sand. A special friend joins Franz Spohn to make a fishing game and Jenny weaves a beaded dream catcher. Candie Cooper lights up the forest with a cool camp lantern.

programme.title: Color Palette Inspiration
programme.desc: Jewelry designer and blogger Erin Prais-Hintz shares tips for drawing inspiration from color palettes, time periods and pop culture. Learn how to find a palette and choose beads based on those colors to make an embellished clasp. Using that color knowledge, make simple, stacking bracelets with beautiful, eye-catching beads. Katie crafts a knotted gemstone necklace.

programme.title: Open and Shut
programme.desc: Add style, movement and interest to your designs. Multi-media artist Mary Hettmansperger adds personality, function and style to her designs with hinges. Candie Cooper returns to Katie's Beading Lesson with cute stretchy beaded rings that are fast and easy to make for teens and tweens.

programme.title: Episode 6: Your Personal Touch
programme.desc: Add a personal touch to your scrapbooking to make it uniquely your own. First, Julie shows how to use your handwriting to add a personal touch. Next, Stacy Julian makes a pocket scrapbook with a flower theme. In an interview segment, Kathy Cano-Murillo shares her creative process. Then, Julie uses colorful fluorescent pens to embellish a page with journaling and doodling. Last, Julie shows how to use watercolors to create a card for a pocket scrapbook page.

programme.title: Wear Your Art
programme.desc: Wear your art and express your maker's spirit wherever you go. Embellishment artist Candie Cooper makes bag charms with leather and beads. Resin artist Susan Lenart Kazmer casts found objects to wear as jewelry or embellishments. Fine artist Andrew Thornton turns a book into a necklace. Back with more art tips is Jane Dunnewold.

programme.title: Wot A Night (1931)
programme.desc: On a dark and stormy night, Tom and Jerry, two ambitious cab drivers, wait outside a train station for fares. When two strange men in top hats disembark from their train, the hacks solicit them until they give in and ask for a ride to their castle. When the men stiff the fare, Tom and Jerry pursue them, only to be trapped inside the castle by a portcullis. They wander about the residence and encounter a fearsome-looking bat, a bathing, whistling skeleton, a veritable army of ghosts, and other assorted ghouls and goblins. After meeting a skeletal quartet in black-face, they find the two strange men again and discover they've been turned into skeletons as well, after which they escape the castle and run for their lives.

programme.title: Haunted Hogmanay (2006)
programme.desc: Haunted Hogmanay (2020) is a horror-comedy short film set during the Scottish New Year celebration, Hogmanay. The story follows a group of people who experience eerie, supernatural events while celebrating, blending dark humor with traditional folklore. As strange occurrences disrupt the festivities, the characters must confront their fears in a quirky yet chilling atmosphere. The film combines horror with holiday tradition, offering a unique twist on the ghost story genre.

programme.title: The Bitter Storm
programme.desc: An embittered scientist secretly invents a receiver which picks up sounds from anytime in the past. programme.title: LOVE IS NOT ENOUGH
programme.desc: A filmmaker is given a commission to make a pop video but takes the money and attempts to complete his own long term film project. He takes to the road and tries to re-engage his old cast but finds them no longer interested in the film. Things go from bad to worse when the crew he has managed to recruit also decide to bail out. This is a film about perseverance in the face of adversity.

programme.title: Deivamagal Episode 15
programme.desc: Deivamagal is an Indian Tamil-language soap opera starring Vani Bhojan and Krishna. It was broadcast on Sun TV initially from Monday to Friday and later extended to Saturday at 8 PM from 25 March 2013 to 17 February 2018 for 1,466 episodes. The show replaced S. Kumarans successful soap, Thirumathi Selvam, and replaced by Nayagi. The show is produced by Vikatan Televistas Pvt Ltd and directed by S. Kumaran. This serial was shot in Pollachi, Chennai, Chengalpet, Hyderabad, Kerala, Puducherry, and Cuddalore. This is the first TV serial shot in the Bay of Bengal Plot Prakash his wife Sathyapriya and his eldest sister-in-law Gayathris conspiracies against their families to conquer Prakshs ancestral property Jai Hind Vilas.

programme.title: Naayagi Episode 24
programme.desc: Nayagi is a 2018 Indian Tamil-language Family Drama series. It premiered on 19 February 2018 on Sun TV, replacing Deivamagal, and was replaced by Anbe Vaa and it ended on 31 October 2020. The show was produced by Vikatan Televistas Pvt Ltd and directed by S Kumaran. Nayagi was also re-aired on Kalaignar TV from 1 March 2021 and it ended its run on 9 July 2022 Plot Anandhi, a middle-class woman, struggles to keep her life together while dealing with an alcoholic father and his debts. Though her landlady Sargunam is formidable, she wishes to destroy Kalivardhan.

programme.title: A Sweet Rush
programme.desc: What began as a tug of war for a six layered cake culminated in Don fixing a security alarm to the kitchen door that stopped anyone from stepping in, even Don himself. Lary Marly and Charly have found a way to dance themselves to the fridge escaping the floor sensors.

programme.title: Sneevil Genie
programme.desc: When the Dude finds a bottle on the beach, he uncorks it and finds a genie. But instead of granting wishes, this genie turns out to be Sneevil who steals all of the Smighty Stones. The Super Six must combine forces to turn the tables on Sneevil!

programme.title: The Jokester
programme.desc: Zaps silly pranks on his friends go too far and he finds himself all alone to fight Sneevil. A hilarious dance off between Zap and Biggs will determine who will get control of the Smighty Stones.

programme.title: MARDANA MURGA
programme.desc: Not too far from the Hotel California, a muscular six-pack rooster escapes from a chicken truck and to everyone surprise he loves Chai Rajas Banana Fries. Sundar decides to use him against Basha. Now Basha has to outwit the duo and get the rooster back into that chicken truck.

programme.title: Kitten up a Tree
programme.desc: When Gummy comes upon a kitten stuck up a tree, he and the gang become increasingly caught up in trying figure out ways to get it back down.

programme.title: See The Problem
programme.desc: Sindbad is an extra-terrestrial, living his life on earth as a 14 year old boy. He and his friends Zac, Lana and Lee live regular lives, doing all the things that kids do: going to school, hanging out with friends, playing sports and computer games, doing homework and pushing back against their parents. After school, the extraordinary adventures begin. With a spaceship stored in the basement they are able to travel to planets in the 7 Galaxies. Sindbad discovers his special powers step by step. As leader of the team, he takes his friends on missions, trying to save the 7 Galaxies from disaster.

programme.title: Smighty Frighty
programme.desc: In this Halloween-themed story, Sneevil and Biggs get the scare of the lifetime when the Spooky Smighties decide to teach them a lesson in the middle of Fright Forest.

programme.title: Easter Egg Surprise Smash
programme.desc: Its the Easter Eggstravanganza and Sneevil traps Smighties in googs - slime-filled gooey eggs. Luckily, Dude is able to crack the secret code and help the Super Six rescue them in time.

programme.title: FAN-FARE
programme.desc: Its a hot day and the one and only small table fan is the point of all attraction. Chai Raja deftly improvises for himself, but he is extremely concerned that none of his customers should have cause to complain. Sundar, himself too pouring from his pores, ignores his discomfort and sets about switching the blast of breeze (though its a rickety and extremely temperamental old fan) to keep the customers cool. But Basha wants his bit of breeze and is intent to steal the wind from Sundars sails! A tug-of-war for the fan ensues... Basha plays havoc sticking vadas under the fan for wheels and wheeling it off or by hoisting it up with a tricky fishing line. Sundar tries to keep the customers happy by using palm-leaf fans and fanning with all limbs possible...but the customers are too many. And Basha aggravates matters by using the fans breeze to spray paint Sundars body with fruit juice! Sundar chases Basha who smartly propels himself about with the fan, and even blows pillow fluff at Sundar to deter him from the chase. But the last proves to be a bad idea as the fluff sticks in the fan blades, damages it and the rusty things blows up! Scene cuts to show Sundar running behind Basha..but when camera pulls back we see that the two are on a kind of crude treadmill that powers a giant coconut frond wind-mill that lulls breeze at the tea-shop. Chai Raja grins and sloshes tea that forms a smiley with a wink at camera.

programme.title: Slimey Smlugs
programme.desc: Sneevils newest pet Smlugs are destroying all of the plumbing in Smightyland. The Super Six must smlug drive them out before its too late.

programme.title: Moo-Ing Trouble!
programme.desc: Help! There is a cow in the bathroom this time, and he is on a mad eating spree, happily mooing away soap bubbles too!Don & Colonel try in vain to get rid of the cow but the three mice seem to have a different agenda. To make matters worse, a bull has made its grand entry into the scene too

programme.title: Camping Trip
programme.desc: In a multi-coloured SUV, Don and Colonel with their bagpacks zipped are set for a camping trip. Watch them in close contact with nature and “trouble”.

programme.title: Scared
programme.desc: Gummy, Harry and Kala watch a scary late-show on TV – and all wind up too scared to go to bed, their imaginations soon running wild...

programme.title: Orders up
programme.desc: Business is good and Chai Raja is grinning wider with each ring of the cash register. His mood gets a further lift as a guy in a black suit (an agent) enters with a briefcase marked Top Secret. As Sundar delivers tea to the agent, he is intrigued by the briefcase. Basha chooses to make off with the snacks of the customer at the adjacent table at that very minute. Sundar leaps at Basha and in his hurry upsets the agents plate and tea, knocking down the briefcase. Chai Raja is immediately at agents side, apologizing- he absently picks the briefcase back up(not noticing a fallen plate-like device) and gives it to the agent. The annoyed agent leaves and Sundar gets extra chores as punishment. Basha cant help taunt Sundar as he is stuck doing the chores- In a fit of anger, Sundar chases Basha back into the hotel and randomly hurls the plate like device. Before the chase can continue though, Sundar is sharply reprimanded and hauled off by Chai Raja. Basha meanwhile finds the object that Sundar had just thrown a tad bizarre and pokes around. Lo! It turns out to be a gadget that can make just about anything levitate! Chuckling impishly, Basha sets off towards the hotel, gadget at ready intent on helping Sundar get every order UP! The chaos gets out of hand when Basha sends the device into overdrive and is himself lifted off and bounced around. In the end however, the agent returns and reclaims the device much to the relief of all who drop back down.

programme.title: Field Trip Fiasco
programme.desc: The bros set out for a trip to the great Qutab Minar. And they make sure that they got rid of the rat trio before entering. But Larry Charly and Marly are way too smarter than any of us. To make matters worse, they bombard the entire structure and put the blame on Don and Colonel. Will they ever escape this??

programme.title: Sneaky Genie
programme.desc: When the Dude finds a bottle on the beach, he uncorks it and finds a genie. But instead of granting wishes, this genie turns out to be Sneevil who steals all of the Smighty Stones. The Super Six must combine forces to turn the tables on Sneevil!

programme.title: Let's Dance
programme.desc: To complete the next step on her Mondojitsu Path, April has to master the dance of the falcon. Since Xia won’t help because he’s too embarrassed to dance with her, April accepts the assistance of Mei, who turns out to be a great dancer. While they’re distracted, Negu sends Amkko and Koto to steal the Glove of the North, but Mei, who feels appreciated for the first time in his life, helps April to win it back.

programme.title: Hungabunga
programme.desc: Sneevils evil plant, the hunga bunga, grows out of control and captures the Smighties. Its up to Dude and his fish friends to stop it.

programme.title: The Wet Cat
programme.desc: Cat is chasing Keet in the mud and gets dirty, GrandPA is in the garden watering the plants he points the hose pipe to Cat and gets him wet and tells Dunky to give him a long due bath. Much to Keets amusement.

programme.title: PAI THE WIZARD
programme.desc: Discouraged with cleaning Maestro Meow’s humble hut, Pai uses the Elder’s conch horn (which Pai thinks is magic) to summon what he thinks are “Cleaner Birds.” But they prove to be Party Birds, and soon have overrun the Westerly Breeze!

programme.title: Christmas Episode
programme.desc: Its Christmas time and Gummy Bear and all his pals are out to celebrate Christmas. They are going to have some serious fun along with some surprises!!

programme.title: Lets Get Kraken
programme.desc: Sindbad is an extra-terrestrial, living his life on earth as a 14 year old boy. He and his friends Zac, Lana and Lee live regular lives, doing all the things that kids do: going to school, hanging out with friends, playing sports and computer games, doing homework and pushing back against their parents. After school, the extraordinary adventures begin. With a spaceship stored in the basement they are able to travel to planets in the 7 Galaxies. Sindbad discovers his special powers step by step. As leader of the team, he takes his friends on missions, trying to save the 7 Galaxies from disaster.

programme.title: Eye Strain
programme.desc: The rat trio takes their plan one step ahead by fixing contact lens in Don’s eyes while he is asleep, thereby blurring his vision. Now the rats just partyyyyy and Don can’t see a thing. But when Colonel finds out the plan, the naughty rats are definitely in for a surprise.

programme.title: Christmas Ring Ring
programme.desc: Hey kids! Emmie our cute little elephant loves dancing & sings good english songs. Its time to enjoy the pirate song & more with Emmie! Sway and listen to great kids song like Pirate song , Rain, Catch a wave and hula hoop! Get your preschooler grooving to the beats!

programme.title: Remote War
programme.desc: Don and the terrific trio are at war for the TV remote. It all comes down to a swallowed remote that changes channels with every hiccup. Now that is very convenient. The mice get ready in Scuba Gear to perform a close tummy surgery to save the remote. Will sentimental soap or Jolly Good cricket win the Toss?

programme.title: Cat Romance
programme.desc: Its a lovely morning suddenly gone berserk as Cat comes charging in to catch Keet. He opens his jaw wide open when he stops…viola …a beautiful white kitten with big dapping eyelashes and eyes as blue as the clear ocean

programme.title: The Note
programme.desc: Team Racing is introduced. Speed, X and Annalise are on one team. When Analise is made team captain they must get over their differences for the good of the team. Before the race Annalise is contacted by the Shadowy woman who tells her that a saboteur will enter the race and attack the Mach 6. She orders Annalise to aid the saboteur. It seems like Annalise might but at the last moment takes the hit and saves Speed and the Mach 6. While investigating where the saboteur came from, Speed and the gang discover a tear in the virtual track. The saboteurs got in through the tear, which leaves the school vulnerable to attack. Conor patches the tear but they have to find the source. Since the virtual track is temporarily closed the Racer Academy is invited to race at the Alpha Academy. Tipped off by Speed Sr., Speed and Conor investigate and find the source of the virtual tear. They chalk it up to competitive sabotoge, but we find out that the Alpha Academy is connected to the Shadowy Organization.

programme.title: Dunky Doll
programme.desc: Hoodie the crow is really upset with Dunky as he is so loyal that GrandPAs house & is the only house were he cannot steal anything.

programme.title: Comet Run
programme.desc: X begins acting strangely, creating tension with Speed and the others. When X leaves to join the Shadowy Organization, Speed decides to infiltrate the Shadowy Org to save him. Speed soon discovers that X is working undercover. When Xs cover is blown, he and Speed must try and escape the Shadowy Organization HQ with the missing Part.

programme.title: A sticky situation
programme.desc: Ragoo brings in a sticky wrapper and the twins arrive in a sandy desert. They travel to the pond world and to the winter world before they can put it in a bin.

programme.title: HOME ALONE
programme.desc: When the Elders sail off to meditate, the Guardians argue about who’s in charge. Negu takes advantage of the Elders’ absence to send cute mutants who prove to be slimy, multiplying monsters. To beat them, all the Guardians have to do is…whistle!

programme.title: Ghost Attack
programme.desc: Its Friday the 13th. Cat is watching a late night horror movie and all creeped out when it ends…a perfect opportunity for Keet to get even.

programme.title: LOVE IS BLIND
programme.desc: Fulfilling the Elders’ assignment to wrangle clouds, Pai falls in love with a rodent girl named Lol. But Lol proves to be one of Negu’s mutants, intent on stealing the Glove of the North.

programme.title: Hopeless Dreams
programme.desc: Cat is taking a cat nap as Keet flies in and bangs a pan on Cats head and wakes him up. Cat gets up in a start and amazed by what he sees.

programme.title: Cardboard Roll
programme.desc: Watch Hepi and Briko give toilet paper rolls a second more exciting life!

programme.title: Comet Run
programme.desc: X begins acting strangely, creating tension with Speed and the others. When X leaves to join the Shadowy Organization, Speed decides to infiltrate the Shadowy Org to save him. Speed soon discovers that X is working undercover. When Xs cover is blown, he and Speed must try and escape the Shadowy Organization HQ with the missing Part.

programme.title: Plastic Bottle
programme.desc: Watch Hepi an Briko transform plastic bottles to something out of this world. Literally.

programme.title: Rowdy Cloudy
programme.desc: When Pancake angers a cloud by not listening, the livid cumulus vents its anger by taking Pancake on a wild ride, storming all over the Zooniverse. An apology, when sincere, can help make things right.

programme.title: Dragonfish Lake
programme.desc: The twins are out skateboarding and delivering newspapers to homes around Abra-Dabra, but Uncle Charlie warns them it can be dangerous as it might hit someone. But thinking of the possibility of the idea, Charlie tries a hand at throwing a newspaper onto Tiggy’s lawn, but ends up flying in through the window. On hearing a scream, Charlie rushes in apologising for hitting Tiggy, but it turned out that Tiggy was moaning for what he read in the newspaper. It was about a contest of the Chef Challenge Award featuring whether Tiggy’s rival, Chef Alfonse could win it. Tiggy always wanted to win the challenge but never knew what original recipe to make. Tiggy gets jealous as he reads Chef Alfonse’s fish-a-la mode recipe that he promises to create the dish himself and if turns out to be really good as the newspaper says it is, he will admit how good his rival really is. So Tiggy waits a long while at the lake to catch a fresh fish as the recipe calls for it. Soon all his friends come over to help him fish, each with their very own fish lines. Seems a little magical assistance can help this time. But the lake is now occupied by one big playful dragon fish. The dragon fish turns out to be really hungry, so Tiggy sets out to make the biggest beetroot and berry snack ever. The dragonfish gulps it all down happily, but Deedee is sad she couldn’t really help Tiggy with the recipe. Tiggy on the other hand is quite ecstatic that he was able to whip up the most original dish ever. So over pancakes the next day Tiggy discovers that he has been awarded the annual Chef Challenge Award for the most original beetroot and berry recipe based on the photo and information Deedee gave to the judges. Tiggy is delighted to see an appreciative comment by Chef Alfonse that Tiggy’s surprise-a-la dragonfish being totally top-notch.

programme.title: The Frogs Who Desired a King
programme.desc: Frogs are afraid of the snake who showed up in their lake one day. Frogs pray for the strong king who will protect them, and the God sends them the king in return.

programme.title: The Magic Lamp
programme.desc: Gummy finds an old magic lamp – complete with a genie popping out when he chances to rub it. The three pals suddenly have three wishes .

programme.title: OH, RATS!
programme.desc: It’s quiet…TOO quiet, according to Pai, who’s convinced Negu’s about to attack. Pai prepares a trap. But the evil lord of the Chou World is depressed by all his failures. Mei decides to launch an attack himself. He can only get one mutant rat to follow him…who in turn is followed by lots of fellow mutant rats. The Guardians laugh at Mei and his rats, but the rats have a secret weapon: horrible, high-pitched SCREAMS! Pai knits earmuffs for himself, April, and Xia, then lures the rats onto his trap with cheese. In the end, Pai savors the silence.

programme.title: Marco's Garden
programme.desc: The neighboring dog Moti is very fussy about his Garden of the house and takes his job seriously to guard it.

programme.title: Jack and the Beanstalk
programme.desc: A kind boy GoGo finds a bean seed and grows it, which sprouts all the way into the clouds. GoGo climbs the plant and finds the Giants castle above the clouds.

programme.title: Misadventure
programme.desc: The painter inside Don has woken and he must have his painting on the wall. But the rats are ready even to turn the world upside down to stop Don from fulfilling his dream. And you can imagine what will follow. But whatever happens in between, it is all a sweet happy ending.

programme.title: SOMETHING STINKS
programme.desc: Negu has his henchmen pump a foul green fog up to the Yan World, forcing the Elders to evacuate the Westerly Breeze. Aboard the Lord of the Wind, Pai fails to impress the Elders and gets “Rocky Rodent” – a crisis of confidence. The Elders have to pump Pai’s confidence back up so he can help Xia and April defeat the Worm Monster sent by Negu.

programme.title: Egg Carton
programme.desc: Hepi and Briko using their smarts make the best use of an old egg carton

programme.title: Colour Chaos
programme.desc: Mayor De Pfeffel can’t decide what colour to paint the town hall as it is so dull and grey. So Deedee offers to help, without magic this time, by getting a town vote as to which colour is liked best. Deedee and Nino go ahead and do just that, asking each and everybody they see in Abra-Dabra and noting their choice of colours. Boris and Sandy are confused so set out to paint and decide, but end up messing up the wall. They seek the help of Deedee, who is all so ready to help. But Nino is scared things will get worse with the powerful magic spell, and with good reason. The spell not only “cleaned” Charlie’s wall but made grey stripes on the walls of every house in Abra-Dabra! Even Tiggy’s yellow house is all grey!! So Deedee and everybody else pitch in and paint every house back to its original colour. So the final building standing is the town hall, but no one has sufficient pain for any one colour. So they finally decide to paint it with every colour they have, like a rainbow!

programme.title: It's Hard Being A Mommy
programme.desc: A baby duck comes out of its eggshell and the first thing it sees is Duda. So, he thinks Duda is his mom! Duda ends up taking care of the baby hoping his mother will come for him soon. But the baby duck is a handful and causes Duda quite a bit of trouble. Duda realizes that it is difficult to take care of a baby. The friends decide to go find the ducks real mother and leave the baby in Scots care. At first, Scot thinks that taking care of the baby is an easy job, but he quickly learns that it is not. Eventually, they find the babys real mother, and its time for Duda to say goodbye. Duda is sad to see the baby duck leaving..

programme.title: You Can Leave Your Hat Off
programme.desc: When Odessa doesnt want to get rid of her old coat, now to small, because shes had it forever (and is a little afraid of change), but when she ends up helping Ene find a hat, she learns that change isnt something to be afraid, but something to be embraced. Change can be good

programme.title: Kitten up a Tree
programme.desc: When Gummy comes upon a kitten stuck up a tree, he and the gang become increasingly caught up in trying figure out ways to get it back down.

programme.title: Friends or Foes
programme.desc: Its friendship day and Dunky makes both Keet and Cat share friendship bands with each other and makes them promise to maintain friendship for a day at least.

programme.title: Flash Blind
programme.desc: Don rips apart the parcel and out comes A Brand New Camera! Don is on a clicking spree. He makes colonel pose and ends up clicking Ballu. From friends to enemies to the innards of his tummy, he captures it all.

programme.title: The Easter Episode
programme.desc: Wheres the Easter Bunny? And what are chocolate bunny eggs? Gummy and Friends are about to find out

programme.title: Money In The Bank
programme.desc: Money money money! Dons safe is full of money. And colonel suggests to put the money in bank. But, Charly Marly and Larry want to become rich!!! and they will just not let go of the money. It is pandemonium in the house and the bank. Bang bang bang!

programme.title: Coach Dad
programme.desc: Fred’s Dad wants to spend more time with him. He becomes the new gym coach at school. Unfortunately, he is so tough on the kids Fred has to use Friday to make fake notes from their parents, until Fred and Brains are the only ones left doing the tough workout.

programme.title: Panda-Monium
programme.desc: Maestro Woof needs the kind of bamboo that the Purple Panda eats so he can make a new flute, and he sends the Guardians to find some. Xia criticizes April’s skills as a pilot, so she decides to take the Lord of the Wind on a practice run while her friends look for the bamboo. When Xia and Pai are captured by a Mutant Purple Panda, April gets to show off her piloting prowess as she rescues them, and at the same time gathers the bamboo they need.

programme.title: Final Attack
programme.desc: The Guardians fall out with each other and start training separately. But that very day, Negu decides to send out ALL his mutants at the same time. Xia and Pai are captured and April has to descend to the Chou World to free them. By working as a team and using the mutants’ weaknesses against them, they finally defeat them all.

programme.title: Paint Job
programme.desc: It is makeover time. Paint, brushes, brooms and rollers, they have it all. But the mice want the walls in a shade of red, and Don and Colonel have decided that it has to be blue. To solve the confusion, Colonel cements the mice’s house shut. What would the mice do in return?

programme.title: LOVE IS BLIND
programme.desc: Fulfilling the Elders’ assignment to wrangle clouds, Pai falls in love with a rodent girl named Lol. But Lol proves to be one of Negu’s mutants, intent on stealing the Glove of the North.

programme.title: JOY RIDE
programme.desc: The Elders assign the Guardians to clean the Lord of the Wind. They can’t resist riding the annual Surf Winds, but Xia and April end up captured by the Wind Beast. Pai rescues them by repulsing the sensitive Wind Beast with his onion and sulfur-geyser stink.

programme.title: The Thing That Slept Over
programme.desc: An alien slug monster that inhabits it’s victims has possessed some girl at school, but Brains doesn’t know which one. She awkwardly throws her first slumber party to figure it out. Simone, the new girl Fred has a crush on, carries the alien, and attracts Fred and Sir Percival to sap their human energy!

programme.title: Show Time
programme.desc: We start the show with a close up of the remote the camera pulls out to see Keet picking the remote and starts watching the last episode of “ Bigger boss” a reality show on TV.

programme.title: An Eerie Hustle
programme.desc: Don finally gets to play tit for tat with the mice and they are running for their lives. Don’s house turns into haunted house and the ghost of Don is hungry for some dead meat preferably dead mice meat.

programme.title: GLOVE OF THE SOUTH
programme.desc: Negu is thrilled to learn there is a Glove of the South hidden on the Guardians’ island. He sends a big-eyed mutant, The Finder, to find the glove and bring it to him. The Guardians try to stop The Finder, but fail. Luckily, when Negu dons the Glove of the South, it tickles him mercilessly! The Glove of the South was a trick, invented by the Elders!

programme.title: Banding Together
programme.desc: When Maple joins the Zoonicorns’ band, her off-kilter playing disrupts the entire Zooniverse. Working together/Not giving up.

programme.title: Biggerish
programme.desc: Maple is tired of being small, but when she eats the fruit of the Biggle Tree in atop Zoonihorn Mountain, she grows so big, she becomes a destructive giant!. Be careful what you wish for; persevere, no matter what the problem.

programme.title: ICE ATTACK
programme.desc: The Elders confiscate the Guardians’ weapons until they learn to value each other. Negu sends Ice Poppy, a cute mutant who can shoot ice and freeze you if you look in her eyes. Valuing each other, the Guardians defeat Ice Poppy and earn their weapons back.

programme.title: Smorigins
programme.desc: The Super Six go back in time to find out the origins of the Smighty Stones. The Villains tag along, too and find themselves in the middle of a prehistoric dragon battle.

programme.title: Rocking Chair
programme.desc: GrandPAs chair has broken and wants Dunky to make a new one. Dunky agrees to make it for him and gets into action in the verandah.

programme.title: How To Meet a Spoon
programme.desc: Odessa is scared of meeting new people when she goes off to camp, so the Zoonicorns use a flashback to remind her that she knows how to make new friends – and that its fun! When you’re afraid of trying something new, you can practice until it is not scary anymore.

programme.title: Cita a ciegas
programme.desc: Eugenia, jefa de policía. Kostya, lechero en una granja. Y una cita a siegas que dará un giro inesperado.

programme.title: Prisionera citadina
programme.desc: Lena y Sergey esperan gemelos y pronto recibirán su nuevo apartamento, pero les espera un reto más.

programme.title: Prisionera citadina
programme.desc: Lena y Sergey esperan gemelos y pronto recibirán su nuevo apartamento, pero les espera un reto más.

programme.title: Las cabras curan
programme.desc: Por una seria enfermedad, Yana y su familia se mudan al campo para cambiar radicalmente su estilo de vida.

programme.desc: News from the U.S. and around the world.

programme.title: Al Arabiya News
programme.desc: Be at the forefront of top stories, breaking news, current affairs and all there is to know in the Arab region and around the world.

programme.desc: "An officer from the underworld joins forces with a policeman to track down evil spirits that have escaped to the mortal realm. programme.title: Love At First Bite
programme.desc: Xi Yue, a staunch believer of fate, meets the rational and cold Martius whom she believes bring her bad luck. Unknown to her, Martius has been quietly helping Xi Yue achieve her culinary dream.

programme.title: Vettai
programme.desc: "They are part of a special task force assembled to tackle cases pertaining to the Indian community and Indian immigrants. The unit is not widely publicized and their work is kept under wraps. Spearheaded by Chief Dayanidhi, the team consists of three teams and an assigned criminologist. Together they try to tackle cold blooded murders, kidnaps and sexual crimes. But as their professional and personal lives collide, the team is headed towards a perilous outcome. Lives will be lost and bonds will be broken. The pledge that they made to uphold justice and peace in the country that they love will be put to the test. How will they survive? Where does it all lead to? Who is the villain and who is the hero?"

programme.title: Popeye the Sailor Meets Ali Baba's Forty Thieves 1937

programme.title: Ancient Fistory 1953
programme.desc: It's the middle ages (sort of); Popeye is working in Bluto's Beanery. Bluto is going to the ball where Princess Olive will choose her mate. Popeye's fairy godpappy appears and it's a reverse Cinderella story, with a car created from a can of spinach.

programme.title: Parlez Vous Woo 1956
programme.desc: Olive is so captived by "The International", a radio personality with a French accent, that she'd rather stay home than go out on a date with Popeye. Bluto, overhearing this, comes to the door as the character. Popeye does his best to get Olive back, to no avail. Finally, Bluto challenges Popeye to a duel, ultimately stabbing him in the chest where his can of spinach was. Popeye unmasks Bluto, then eats another can of spinach to give himself a French accent.

programme.title: The Hole Idea 1955
programme.desc: A scientist invents the portable hole, only to have a thief steal his samples to go on a crime spree.

programme.title: The Good Egg 1939

programme.title: The Conceited General
programme.desc: Set in ancient China. After a great victory, the general becomes complacent and out of practice. When the enemy returns, he acts like a punk.

programme.title: The Gumby Show: Mysterious Fires 1957
programme.desc: A knight mistakes Gumby for a magician and asks for his help in fighting a set of mysterious fires around the kingdom.

programme.title: Plane Dumb-1932
programme.desc: After crash landing in Africa, Tom and Jerry masquerade as Africans in a futile attempt to adapt to a strange environment.

programme.title: Boo Moon
programme.desc: Casper emerges from a subway station, following a crowd of scared strangers. He encounters a man saying "see the wonders of the moon for ten cents," and offering a sight through a telescope. Casper scares the man away, then uses the telescope to see the moon. He then flies to the moon for a visit. Casper lands on the moon, disappointed to find no man on the moon. He lies down to nap, then tiny moon men emerge from holes. They capture Casper, like Lilliputians did to Gulliver, then place him in a cage on wheels, in which they tow him to the Ruler of the Moon, King Luna. The King addresses Casper as a monster, and treats him as an enemy. Casper playfully picks up King Luna, and the king has him placed in the royal dungeon. A dejected Casper is imprisoned. Then animated trees attack the city of the moon men. The moon men defend their fortified city with flaming missiles. The tree monsters fight back with water, then break through the town walls. When the fight seems lost to the tree monsters, Casper escapes his cage, and helps the moon men. Casper goes underground. The friendly ghost then pulls trees' parts through the moon surface and ties them together, immobilizing the trees. The frustrated trees writhe and strain against the knots Casper has tied. Casper and the moon men have won. Then, and only then, does King Luna embrace Casper as a friend. King Luna knights Casper for the valiant defense of his people. Then all the moon men join in singing the Casper theme song.

programme.title: Felix Doubles for Darwin- 1924
programme.desc: A famished Felix reads an advertisement telling of a large reward for anyone that can give proof for the theory of evolution. He hurries to South Africa via Transatlantic Cable and interacts with the local animals. He angers a troop of monkeys by telling them why he's there (they're offended he would suggest they could be related to humans) and they chase him back through the cable to America

programme.title: Educated Fish-1937
programme.desc: A rebellious fish refuses to listen to his teacher until he ventures out into the real world and discovers the importance of education.

programme.title: Aladdin(Mel-O-Toons) 1960
programme.desc: In this adaptation of the Arabian Nights tale, poor Aladdin discovers a magic lamp containing a genie who grants his wish to marry a princess.

programme.title: Space Transformer 1985
programme.desc: Using new technology, a crew consisting of Captain Chi, Nancy, and the robots Baipam and Diatron 5, is shrunken to microscopic size and injected into Ivy's body in order to defeat the invaders. Enlisting benevolent beings found inside Ivy's body, the crew prepares for an inner space battle that can decide the fate of the world.

programme.title: Tokyo Woes-1945
programme.desc: When Tokyo Rose begins spewing her anti-American propaganda over the airwaves, Seaman Hook is inspired to fight back, using War Bonds as literal weapons against her.

programme.desc: Little Nemo-1911

programme.title: Fresh Airedale 1945
programme.desc: In his master's eyes, "good old Shep" is the perfect dog, but the cat knows he's really a two-faced mutt who can be bought off with a bone by a burglar, and then take credit for it when the cat chases the crook off. But then Shep becomes obsessed by a newspaper story proclaiming a real canine hero the nation's "No. 1 Dog."

programme.title: Noah's Ark 1959
programme.desc: Noah gets the word: build an ark in seven days. His sons cut the necessary trees in three days, and much furious sawing and hammering follows. But there's no rest, as they need to round up all the animals. Noah boards the animals, then his sons, their wives, and his wife (who packed a ferocious picnic). The rains and flood begin. The animals soon develop cabin fever and get restless, but Mrs. Noah has the answer: "Music has charms to soothe the savage beast." His sons find instruments and begin playing; everyone dances. But Harry the hippo dances with everyone but his wife; Noah goes to her, and while she tells him not to mention Harry's name, Noah convinces her that Harry is thinking only of her. The rains end; Noah sends a dove out who brings back an olive branch. They land on Mount Ararat and disembark.

programme.title: Betty Boop- More Pep- 1936
programme.desc: In a return to the 'Out of the Inkwell' format, Betty Boop invents a 'pep' formula to speed up lazy Pudgy, but it escapes into the 'real world' with rapid results.

programme.title: Big Bad Sindbad 1952
programme.desc: Popeye tells his nephews about the time he walloped Sinbad, the *second* greatest sailor who ever lived

programme.title: Much ado About Nutting 1953
programme.desc: A squirrel in a downtown park lugs a giant coconut back home, but nothing he does can seem to crack it open.

programme.title: My Dear Secretary 1948
programme.desc: A romance novelist appoints a would-be writer as his secretary. Although she is initially dismayed by his work ethic and playboy attitude, they begin to fall in love

programme.title: War Feathers 1926
programme.desc: The gang is on a train trip with their parents through the "old West". They sneak off the train at a town called Hot Dog, and find themselves mixed up with a gunfight, a covered wagon and a bandit hideout.

programme.title: The Masquerader-1914
programme.desc: Charlie is an actor in a film studio. He messes up several scenes and is tossed out. Returning dressed as a lady, he charms the director. Even so, Charlie never makes it into film, winding up at the bottom of a well.

programme.title: Neath Brooklyn Bridge-1942
programme.desc: The East Side Kids uncover the body of a murder victim, but must protect the innocent girl accused of the crime

programme.title: His Double Life-1933
programme.desc: Priam Farrel is a celebrated artist but a social recluse. When his valet dies of a sudden illness, a mix-up leads to the body being identified as Farrel's. The timid artist then assumes the identity of his former servant, but finds himself faced with constant dilemmas as a result.

programme.title: The latest sports that you may have missed!

Code of the Cactus 1939
programme.desc: When Blackton outbids Bill Carson. Bill suspects he will have to rustle cattle to fulfill the contract. So Bill arrives posing as an Mexican. programme.title: Hawkeye and the Last of the Mohicans S1E30 False Faces

programme.title: Buffalo Bill, Jr. S1E16 Grave of the Monsters
programme.desc: A professor and his men are taking a survey on the Navajo Reservation land so that they can get to the rock oil that is underneath the rocks. They murder the Indian agent and then try to kill the chief's son White Eagle. Buffalo Bill Jr. is concerned for the land of his friends and tries to find out who is behind these killings and why.

programme.title: Privada Cigar Club

programme.title: Texas Cigar Roadshow

programme.title: Texas Cigar Roadshow
programme.desc: On this episode of Texas Cigar Roadshow, we review the 2023 Sam Adams Utopias paired with a CAO Cameroon cigar. We believed the sweetness of the cigar would perfectly complement the bold flavors expected from this Utopias.

programme.title: Creekside Cigar Co

programme.title: Who Saw The Men In Black
Guest Shaun T
programme.desc: Shaun T is an amazing fitness trainer — the man behind Insanity — and he’s had a fascinating life. He goes deep into how he was sexually abused throughout his youth and how he’s become an inspiration to others and what you really should be doing to get the best workout you can.

programme.title: Guests Rita and Theodore Smith, Obria Shaw and Dakari Jones, Chrissy Cupcake & her husband Christian
programme.desc: Rita & Theodore Smith, Obria Shaw & Dakari Jones, and Chrissy Cupcake & her husband Christian join Yonathan Elias to answer trivia questions about Aquarius celebrities, trending news, music, and Black History & Culture to win cash prizes.

programme.title: Episode 1
programme.desc: The Rev. Dr. Al Sharpton delivers a daily video message encouraging you to act with intent and purpose. Every day brings new challenges and opportunities. reACT accordingly!

programme.title: Guests Dajha Vu, Supreme, Bashworld
programme.desc: Yonathan Elias is joined by Dajha Vu, Supreme, and Bashworld who play Couch Party for the Culture and for cash!

programme.title: Guests Glynn Turman, Valeria Howard-Cunningham
programme.desc: Tanya Hart speaks with actors, recording artists, and creatives in the entertainment industry.

programme.title: Guest Charles Blow
programme.desc: Charles Blow is a New York Times writer with a big idea: Black people should move back down South to create Black majority states and grow our political power. It’s a fascinating idea that we have to argue about.

programme.title: Animal House!
programme.desc: Watch heroes work with overcrowded, underfunded animal shelters in this uplifting, series!

programme.title: The Most Intense Demonstration Ever
programme.desc: Follow along with Direct Action Everywhere as hundreds invade the San Francisco Ferry Building!

programme.title: One woman's journey to powerhouse influencer!
programme.desc: Victoria Moran reveals her journey to becoming a best-selling author and powerhouse influencer!

programme.title: Plant-Based by Nafsika - The Good Food Institute, Vegan Tamales, and Vegan Interior Design!
programme.desc: Plant-Based by Nafsika presents Bruce Freidrich, Eddie Garza, and Deborah Rosenberg.

programme.title: Infinity And Back
programme.desc: Infinity and Back is the story of one man's dream to stand on the very top of the world, Mt. Everest

programme.title: Vegan Travel with Eunice Reyes - Magnifique Montreal
programme.desc: Montreal is dripping with culture and cuisine and Eunice Reyes takes you on a dazzling food tour.

programme.title: Plant-Based by Nafsika - Plant-based Vitality, Yoga Routine + Vegan Chocolate Bars!
programme.desc: This Plant-Based by Nafsika episode features Christian Limoges, Naturopath, exploring how plant-based supplements improve quality of life. Kelcie Mahr of Core Love Yoga leads a healing yoga routine, and Hadara Slok, founder of Rawclates, shows how to make vegan chocolate bars. Don’t miss this blend of wellness, movement, and sweet treats!

programme.title: S4E10 - Pinks All Out
programme.desc: Hundreds of the best drag racers in the country bring their “A” game to the track in search of glory and their share of $18,000 in cash and prizes in front of thousands of ALL OUT Fans!

programme.title: S4E3 - Pinks All Out
programme.desc: Hundreds of the best drag racers in the country bring their “A” game to the track in search of glory and their share of $18,000 in cash and prizes in front of thousands of ALL OUT Fans!

programme.title: S3E6 - Pinks All Out
programme.desc: Hundreds of the best drag racers in the country bring their “A” game to the track in search of glory and their share of $18,000 in cash and prizes in front of thousands of ALL OUT Fans!

programme.title: S4E6 - Pinks All Out
programme.desc: Hundreds of the best drag racers in the country bring their “A” game to the track in search of glory and their share of $18,000 in cash and prizes in front of thousands of ALL OUT Fans!

programme.title: S3E4 - Pinks All Out
programme.desc: Hundreds of the best drag racers in the country bring their “A” game to the track in search of glory and their share of $18,000 in cash and prizes in front of thousands of ALL OUT Fans!

programme.title: Ghost Boat
programme.desc: Trapped aboard the family yacht, Samantha lives out her personal Hell, night after night, answering to the cruel and painful demands of the ship's alarm system. Taking a journey into the depths of depravity, she wakes each morning to the disfiguring scars left by the previous night's horror and searches for the answer to a missing memory: 'Could I have killed my family... Or did Hell get it wrong?

programme.title: H.P. Lovecraft's Monster Portal
programme.desc: A cult is about to waken H.P. Lovecraft's most feared creature...

programme.title: Remember Me
programme.desc: Rose awakes in an unknown house following a serious car accident with memory loss and no ability to walk. Her Mother and boyfriend are there to help her. Rose wants to piece together her life before the accident. All is not what it seems...

programme.title: Krampus 2: El Diablo Regresa
programme.desc: Cinco años después del asesinato de su esposa y la desaparición de su hija, el ex policía Jeremy Duffin es traído de vuelta para ayudar en la caza de un monstruo de Yuletide que castiga a los niños que han sido «traviesos». A medida que el monstruo se vuelve más errático e impredecible, Jeremy descubre la verdad sobre la desaparición de su hija y el destino que le ha deparado una fuente improbable. ¿Podrá Jeremy acabar finalmente con la pesadilla del monstruo navideño que ha aterrorizado a este pueblo durante años?

programme.title: Contención
programme.desc: ¿Qué ocurre cuando estalla una epidemia y no se sabe nada? Puede ocurrir cualquier cosa. Poco a poco, los residentes se dan cuenta de que todos morirán a menos que se unan...

programme.title: Poltergeist Americano
programme.desc: Horribles visiones atormentan a Taryn cuando ella, su hermano y sus compañeros de universidad se mudan a una vieja e infame casa. Entonces, sus sangrientas alucinaciones se vuelven demasiado reales...

programme.title: Isla de las Muñecas
programme.desc: Un grupo de personas va a la legendaria Isla de las Muñecas para conocer la verdad mortal...

programme.title: Caribe Sangriento
programme.desc: En un enfrentamiento entre policías y traficantes, una extraña fuerza se apodera de un hombre, concediéndole un super poder.

programme.title: El Pistolero
programme.desc: Uno de los hombres más poderosos de México llega a un pueblo en busca de nuevos pistoleros que quieran formal parte de su equipo, y recluta a un hombre sencillo que acepta el trabajo porque quiere vengar la muerte de su padre.

programme.title: Brindis Mortal
programme.desc: te presentamos la historia de Ramon, el hijo de un poderoso narcotraficante quien anhela convertirse en la mano derecha de su padre y formar parte de su grupo de sicarios. Pero su padre aun no lo considera listo para el trabajo y le da largas. lo cual desespera a Ramon y lo lleva a tomar decisiones que cambiaran para siempre la relación entre padre e hijo.

programme.title: Expediente 53
programme.desc: Esta es una historia de misterio y acción en la ciudad de Bryan Texas el comandante Gatel pide la ayuda del FBI ya que hay muchos desaparecidos, y asesinatos en la ciudad. Los agentes Gutiérrez, Bracho y Miravalle del FBI le comentan al comandante Gatel que ellos sospechan que puede ser obra de una secta satánica y que el líder es un demonio de nombre Abal que está en el cuerpo de una bella mujer de nombre Lilly.

programme.title: Gracias Gauchito
programme.desc: La leyenda de la vida del Gauchito Gil y la construcción del mito son ejes de esta historia. A 40 años de su muerte, un viejo va por los pueblos contando la leyenda del santo pagano. Narra la historia de sus milagros y las hazañas del Gaucho retobado, que supo hacer justicia en tiempos de guerra.

programme.title: El Director (Las Siete Madres de Edipo)
programme.desc: Dos jóvenes estudiantes de actuación siguiendo sus sueños se embarcan en un proyecto para filmar una película de terror que no resulta ser lo que esperaban.

programme.title: El Secreto Oculto
programme.desc: Describe los eventos del fin de los tiempos de la humanidad profetizada por místicos y Santos sobre los 3 días de oscuridad en que los demonios serán soldados ...

programme.title: Soy Una Buena Persona
programme.desc: Sabina es una treintañera muy "artista" convencida de que podrá algún día vivir de su arte como diseñadora, actriz, guionista o directora, porque ella está destinada a petarlo. Mientras, como casi toda su generación, malvive gorroneando en casa de sus padres. Pero una noche tiene, por desgracia ajena, una oportunidad de lujo... y no dudará en aprovecharla sin pensárselo demasiado.

programme.title: El Cóndor En Nueva York
programme.desc: Un narcotraficante de Nueva York, llamado Damián, ha creado una nueva droga con efectos impactantes. Después de varias muertes accidentales, la DEA y la policía se embarcan en una búsqueda inútil en busca de este jefe de la mafia. Damián comienza a derrotar a su competencia con la ayuda de su científico privado y un informante de la DEA. El hijo del alcalde Martínez (de Súper Cóndor) queda en coma tras consumir el nuevo medicamento. El alcalde Martínez vuela a Nueva York desde Perú para comenzar su propia investigación en busca de Damián y una cura. Todo parece sombrío para los agentes de la DEA, el alcalde Martínez y su hijo; hasta que llegue la ayuda. El Cóndor llega a Nueva York desde Perú para ayudar a revertir los efectos de esta nueva y brutal droga y llevar a Damián ante la justicia.

programme.title: Breaking The Bondage Of Wrong Belief
programme.desc: The belief that we need something other than God is what keeps us from going through breakthroughs. That’s how we can be in covenant with God but still in captivity. In “Breaking The Bondage Of Wrong Belief,” Pastor Steven Furtick helps us break up with what’s been holding us back.

programme.title: Rescue Your Testimony
programme.desc: Pastor Steven Furtick helps us deal with disappointment and revive our hope in “Rescue Your Testimony.” You’ll be encouraged to tell your story through the lens of God’s faithfulness.

programme.title: Reverse The Ripple
programme.desc: An event is not your identity. In “Reverse The Ripple,” Pastor Steven Furtick helps us go back to the source of what we’re going through so we can begin to write a new story for our lives.

programme.title: The Prayer That Repairs
programme.desc: Don’t be so confused about the noise around you that you can’t hear the God who made you. When you’re faced with a struggle you didn’t see coming, remember that Jesus is already praying for you, and His prayer is stronger than any attack.

programme.title: Move It To The Middle
programme.desc: Stressed, insecure, and stuck — that’s how Moses felt, too. But that wasn’t the end of his story, and it’s not yours, either. It’s just the middle. There’s hope past this chapter, and it’s found by shifting your focus back to God.
